quest.name: The Lawless Ones
journal: Wyd Lad's ears appear droopy even by Nu Mou standards.
objectives: Deliver the vials of invisible ink to Wyd Lad.

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: What? You...you would be my patron!?

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: But...I can't do anything for you. The lawless ones took my invisible ink, and without it I can't make my arcane wares.

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: Who are the lawless ones? They're Nu Mou like us, except they've turned their backs on our values. Curs without honor, they are.

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: They refuse to work, instead spending all their time cavorting and making a nuisance of themselves. It was when I was outside for a walk that they set upon me and robbed me of my possessions, the ink included.

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: I was too weak to resist them...but you, mortal─you look quite strong. Do you think you could take my ink back from those villains?

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: If you do this, I will consider it your patronage. And by way of my service, I will make you something very special!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: E-Excuse me, Forename, but I couldn't help overhearing. If you mean to undertake this task, will you let me accompany you?

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I would learn from you...and help in what little way I can.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You're welcome to join.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Just don't get in the way.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Thank you so much!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Thank you! I promise I won't be a burden!

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: The lawless ones make their lair to the south, inside a cave called Father Collard's Chambers. They took many vials of ink, and I would be grateful if you could bring as many back as possible.

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: The lawless ones make their lair to the south, inside a cave called Father Collard's Chambers. When they see you, they're like to attack on sight, so please take care!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Father Collard's Chambers is through here. I peered inside, and sure enough, it was milling with Nu Mou. They looked none too friendly.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: If Thancred were here, he'd tell me to go about it quietly and quickly. Let us split up.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I'll find all the ink I can and then come back outside. See you shortly, Forename.

dialogue.name: WYDAENC
dialogue.text: Still offering your patronage to us? When you have a moment, I would speak with you all.

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: M-M-Mercy, Your Majesty! We had no choice! Please forgive us!

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: ...O-Oh, it's you. M-M-My ink─were you able to retrieve it?

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: Haha! Yes, this is the ink, and almost all of it too!

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: When our king spoke to me, my day went from bad to worse, but thanks to you it's simply bad again!

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: What? You had the vision too? Oh, woe is us...

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: Ordinarily, when a living being turns into a sin eater, it loses everything about its mind that defined it. However, the king has retained some of their instincts.

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: This manifests in the desire to play and be free. So strong is that desire, it often leaks through the seal to invade our consciousness.

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text: For a long time we've ignored it, but we can't do so forever...

dialogue.name: WYDLAD
dialogue.text:
But forgive me, I was going to thank you for reuniting me with my ink. You did exactly as I asked, so I will give you the service I promised.
...Ahem! Nothing up my sleeve, and...voilà! May it serve you well!

obj.n: Magic Is Love, Magic Is Life
